fields.label: Display Location
fields.name: display_location
fields.instructions: Location information that you want to display in the Hotels list and Single page. Please note that this is for display purpose only and is not used in filters. Use Attributes for filtering purposes.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.default_value: I'm a solo mytravel, is there a single supplement?

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: description
sub_fields.default_value: A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite.

fields.label: Location Rating
fields.name: location_rating
fields.instructions: Set location rating should reflect how far the property is from popular landmarks, city center and essentials like public transport, airports, convenience store, etc.

fields.label: Display Location
fields.name: display_location
fields.instructions: Location information that you want to display in the Hotels list and Single page. Please note that this is for display purpose only and is not used in filters. Use Attributes for filtering purposes.

fields.instructions: Enter each essential in a separate line. Separate the essential name & distance by a |

sub_fields.label: Airports
sub_fields.name: nearest_airports
sub_fields.instructions: Set custom attributes for the wrapper element. Each attribute in a separate line. Separate attribute key from the value using | character.

sub_fields.name: nearest_public_transportation
sub_fields.instructions: Set custom attributes for the wrapper element. Each attribute in a separate line. Separate attribute key from the value using | character.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: description
sub_fields.default_value: We’ll meet at 4 p.m. at our hotel in Luzern (Lucerne) for a “Welcome to Switzerland” meeting. Then we’ll take a meandering evening walk through Switzerland’s most charming lakeside town, and get acquainted with one another over dinner together. Sleep in Luzern (2 nights). No bus. Walking: light.
